thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Buddy Simba

author: Buddy Simba
title: Buddy Simba
text:
Very easy to fill in information
Also while the flight I booked was on demand the airfare was going up by the minute
This site provided me with the cheapest fare
And as I took longer time to fill in my card details the final payment changed after I clicked submit
I get a message to ignore the higher figure and got a message that the site will honour the lower fare I was given and will pay may back the diffference
I got an email immediately confirming this
